common_issues.title: Authentication and Selection Issues in Pieces OS
common_issues.description: Users are experiencing authentication errors with new installs and difficulty logging in after purchasing pro.  Additionally,  a bug causes continuous selection, as if shift or mouse 1 is stuck.  Suggested solutions include checking firewall settings, browser extensions, and Pieces logs. Reinstalling the app may also help.

related_issues.title: An error occurred in the authentication flow.
related_issues.text:
An error occurred in the authentication flow.
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, Pieces OS

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

12.0.0

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

Hello,
I am receiving this message when attempting to sign-in to Pieces.

```
An error occurred in the authentication flow.
Authentication Error ID: 00000000000000000000000000000000
```

This is a new install. (.appinstaller files)
I have never used the software before.
I do not have a pieces account (yet).
Environment: Windows 11

Launched the authentication by clicking the Sign In button in the Desktop App (4.2.1)
The auth link opened Firefox and generated the error.

I tried the following:
Disabling all extensions in Firefox
Changing my default browser to Edge and re-launching using Edge.
Re-installing with the .exe files.
Reviewed the windows firewall config (Pieces added it itself)
Looked at the Pieces log file but did not see anything obvious enough that I could solve on my own. (See attached)

[log-06252025-copy.txt](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/20907036/log-06252025-copy.txt)

Thank you for the help.
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

common_issues.title: Pieces OS and extensions issues
common_issues.description: Users are experiencing various issues with Pieces OS and its extensions, including Raycast extension incompatibility, authentication failures, and subscription upgrade problems.  The Raycast extension requires an update for compatibility with Raycast 1.100.3.  Authentication issues prevent Pro users from accessing their memberships.  Subscription upgrades fail due to an unresponsive checkout page.  Solutions include updating the Raycast extension, checking authentication credentials, and investigating the checkout process.

related_issues.title: Raycast Extension Incompatible with Current Version of Raycast
related_issues.text:
Raycast Extension Incompatible with Current Version of Raycast


### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, Raycast Extension

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

12.1.0

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

As mentioned on Discord, it appears that the Raycast needs to be updated to be compatible with (at least) the current version of Raycast 1.100.3. Trying to use any of the extension's functions triggers an error saying:

> Your Pieces Raycast Extension needs to be updated,...

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/506778e6-5b13-4811-a21c-82c42384cb41)
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

related_issues.title: Unable to upgrade subscription
related_issues.text:
Unable to upgrade subscription
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

12.1.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

Every time I click "Upgrade" from ANYWHERE - to upgrade to pro, it leads to a page that is blank except for a minimal table, like the bones of a cart checkout view, with like price, subtotal, total, etc. except there are no words, and all the values are 0.00 (zero dollars).. it stays like this for a minute, then says it isn't working properly and returns to the desktop view or the view I was in before. 

been happening for weeks

Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

common_issues.title: Subscription and Authentication Issues
common_issues.description: Users are experiencing difficulty upgrading subscriptions and authenticating their Pro accounts.  The upgrade process leads to a blank checkout page with zero values, eventually failing.  Authentication attempts are unsuccessful, preventing Pro users from accessing features.  This affects both macOS and Windows users on Pieces OS 12.1.1.

common_issues.title: LTM performance degrades over time, becomes unresponsive
common_issues.description: Users report that the Long Term Memory (LTM) functionality slows down and eventually stops returning results after several weeks of use.  The issue occurs on both desktop and via MCP. Clearing LTM data is unsuccessful.  The problem seems related to the volume of data stored in the LTM. Reinstalling or removing all Pieces data temporarily resolves the issue.

related_issues.title: LTM gets gunged up over time
related_issues.text:
LTM gets gunged up over time
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

12.1.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

So when I freshly install Pieces, the LTM works fine.

When I've had it running for a few weeks, and I want to query the LTM, the query takes forever, and returns nothing.

The same happens via the MCP.

I use my machine all day, so there's a lot of context going into the LTM. The only explanation I can come up with is that it's just getting too big. The Workstream is, however, updating fine.

Removing all my Pieces data gets the LTM working again, but then I end up with this situation later. This is the third time I've been through this loop. It's really frustrating, because when I actually need the LTM, it fails.

The Clear LTM Data button doesn't work, just returning to Try again, from All Data to even for just clearing an hour of data.

I haven't cleared the LTM (well, I've tried, but the Clear LTM Data button doesn't work) so we have a live broken environment to debug with. I'm more than happy to assist with debugging this - let me know what you need!

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

i have been trying to authenticate my account . i have purchased pro and have not been successful in utilizing the membership. i have tried to log out and log back in with no success with this issue. 
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

recommendations: Prioritize resolving authentication issues across Pieces OS, Desktop application, and extensions. This appears to be blocking Pro users and new installs.
Investigate and fix the persistent selection bug in the Desktop Application on Windows.  This significantly impacts usability.
Address the Raycast extension incompatibility with Raycast 1.100.3. Release an updated extension.
Troubleshoot and resolve the subscription upgrade process failure.  The blank checkout page indicates a critical error in the payment flow.
Investigate and address the Long Term Memory (LTM) performance degradation.  Determine the cause of the slowdown and implement a solution to maintain optimal LTM functionality.
